questions.text: Are you at the right house?

options.explanation: Correct. The house number is to the right of the door.
Take a closer look. The house number is to the right of the door.

questions.text: How will you react if you feel physically threatened by the client?

options.explanation: Correct. If you are in danger, your primary responsibility is your own safety.
Incorrect. If you are in danger, your primary responsibility is your own safety. Leave and call 911.

options.text: I can handle myself in a fight.
options.explanation: Incorrect. If you are in danger, your primary responsibility is your own safety. Leave and call 911.

questions.text: Look and listen. Do you feel safe knocking on the door?

options.explanation: There aren't any serious red flags; let's continue for now.

questions.text: Feel free to look around some more, then click below to knock on the door.
